Uses of Interface
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.events.SimEvent

  • Packages that use SimEvent 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers
    Provides DatacenterBroker classes that act on behalf of a cloud customer, attending his/her requests for creation and destruction of Cloudlets and VMs, assigning such Cloudlets to specific VMs.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.power
    Provides power-aware DatacenterBroker implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core
    Provides core classes used just internally by CloudSim Plus, except the CloudSim class that is the start point and main class used to run simulations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.events
    Provides classes used by the core message passing mechanisms.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.predicates
    Provides a set of classes that extend the Predicate interface in order to allow filtering messages inside some event queue.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters
    Provides Datacenter implementations, that represents a physical Cloud Datacenter and contains a set of Host that together provide the basic cloud infrastructure.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.network
    Provides network-enabled Datacenter implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.power
    Provides power-aware Datacenter implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.switches
    Provides classes that implement the Switch interface to allow creating Network Switches that compose a network topology.

    • Uses of SimEvent in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers

      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers with parameters of type SimEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void DatacenterBrokerAbstract.processCloudletReturn(SimEvent ev)
      Processes the end of execution of a given cloudlet inside a Vm.
      protected void DatacenterBrokerAbstract.processDatacenterListRequest(SimEvent ev)
      Process a request for the list of all Datacenters registered in the Cloud Information Service (CIS) of the simulation.
      void DatacenterBrokerAbstract.processEvent(SimEvent ev) 
      protected void DatacenterBrokerAbstract.processOtherEvent(SimEvent ev)
      Process non-default received events that aren't processed by the DatacenterBrokerAbstract.processEvent(SimEvent) method.
      protected boolean DatacenterBrokerAbstract.processVmCreateResponseFromDatacenter(SimEvent ev)
      Process the ack received from a Datacenter to a broker's request for creation of a Vm in that Datacenter.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimEvent Simulation.cancel(int src, Predicate<SimEvent> p)
      Cancels the first event from the future event queue that matches a given predicate and was sent by a given entity, then removes it from the queue.

      SimEvent CloudSimEntity.cancelEvent(Predicate<SimEvent> p)
      Cancels the first event from the future event queue that matches a given predicate and that was submitted by this entity, then removes it from the queue.

      Find first deferred event matching a predicate.
      SimEvent CloudSim.findFirstDeferred(int dest, Predicate<SimEvent> p) 
      protected SimEvent CloudSimEntity.getEventBuffer()
      Gets the event buffer.
      SimEvent CloudSimEntity.getNextEvent()
      Gets the first event waiting in the entity's deferred queue, or if there are none, wait for an event to arrive.
      SimEvent CloudSimEntity.getNextEvent(Predicate<SimEvent> p)
      Gets the first event matching a predicate from the deferred queue, or if none match, wait for a matching event to arrive.
      SimEvent Simulation.select(int dest, Predicate<SimEvent> p)
      Selects the first deferred event that matches a given predicate and removes it from the queue.
      SimEvent CloudSim.select(int dest, Predicate<SimEvent> p) 
      SimEvent CloudSimEntity.selectEvent(Predicate<SimEvent> p)
      Extracts the first event matching a predicate waiting in the entity's deferred queue.

      Matches any event received from the registered sources.
